meaningMnemonic: 比較 is <vocabulary>comparison</vocabulary>. So, verb version of that? It's <vocabulary>to compare</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well. Will help a lot to know the word 比較 as well.
